math-extend documentation

= Introduction =

Welcome to the documentation of math-extend. Here you will find all you need to use it.



= Details =

*Math native object extensions*
[[BR]]
Math.sum(Array) => Number

Returns the sum of an array of numbers. Gets an array of number, and returns a number.
[[BR]]

Math.mean(Array) => Number

Returns the mean value of an array of numbers. Gets an array of number, and returns a number.
[[BR]]

Math.median(Array) => Number

Returns the median value of an array of numbers. Gets an array of number, and returns a number.
[[BR]]

Math.stdDev(Array) => Number

Returns the standard deviation value of an array of numbers. Gets an array of number, and returns a number.
[[BR]]

Math.baseLog(Number [, Base]) => Number

Returns the log(Number) with a given base. Default base is 10 if omitted.
[[BR]]
